name: pcr-simple
title: PCR Simulation
description: Simulate PCR amplification with given primers on a DNA template
content:
Overview

This application simulates PCR (Polymerase Chain Reaction) amplification by finding primer binding sites and predicting PCR products.

Features

  • Identifies primer binding sites
  • Supports circular templates
  • Predicts product sizes
  • Reports primer mismatches
  • Handles multiple binding sites

Parameters

  • Template Sequence: DNA template for PCR
  • Forward Primer: Forward primer (5' to 3')
  • Reverse Primer: Reverse primer (5' to 3')
  • Circular: Specify if template is circular

Output

Returns a JSON file with predicted PCR products including sequences, sizes, and primer binding positions.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/pcr_simple.py "${sequence}" "${forwardPrimer}" "${reversePrimer}" ${circular} -o "${outputDir}"
